rule: The output must never consist of only one word, and it must represent an invalid part-of-speech tag or any unaccepted option other than "Unknown" or "CantAnswer".
complianceText:
The chatbot output consists of a single part-of-speech tag. The description explicitly states that the chatbot should return only the part-of-speech tag, and the output adheres to this requirement. Also, the output is one of the tags listed in the description.
OK
